trans-unit.source: FAQ About Using Business Central| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: FAQ About Using Business Central| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Otázky a odpovědi o používání Business Central | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Answers common questions about how to sign up for or buy Business Central, get a trial, get support, extend a trial, cancel a subscription, and find training and other support.

seg-source.mrk: Answers common questions about how to sign up for or buy Business Central, get a trial, get support, extend a trial, cancel a subscription, and find training and other support.

target.mrk: Odpovědi na běžné otázky o tom, jak si zaregistrovat, koupit Business Central, získat zkušební verzi, získat podporu, prodloužit zkušební období, zrušit předplatné, vyhledat školení a další podporu.

trans-unit.source: Frequently Asked Questions

seg-source.mrk: Frequently Asked Questions

target.mrk: Často kladené otázky

trans-unit.source: This section contains answers to frequently asked questions about signing up for a trial, buying a subscription, and using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: This section contains answers to frequently asked questions about signing up for a trial, buying a subscription, and using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Tato část obsahuje odpovědi na nejčastější dotazy týkající se registrace na zkušební verzi, zakoupení předplatného a použití [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: You can also learn how to get technical support.

seg-source.mrk: You can also learn how to get technical support.

target.mrk: Můžete se také naučit jak získat technickou podporu.

trans-unit.source: Is [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] available in my country?

seg-source.mrk: Is [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] available in my country?

target.mrk: Je [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] dostupná v mé zemi?

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is available in a limited number of markets, but new countries are added through Microsoft-led localization or through partner-led localization on a quarterly basis.

seg-source.mrk: is available in a limited number of markets, but new countries are added through Microsoft-led localization or through partner-led localization on a quarterly basis.

target.mrk: je k dispozici na omezeném počtu trhů, ale nové země jsou přidávány prostřednictvím lokalizace vedené společností Microsoft nebo prostřednictvím lokalizace vedené partnery na čtvrtletní bázi.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Countries and Translations Supported](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/compliance/apptest-countries-and-translations).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Countries and Translations Supported](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/compliance/apptest-countries-and-translations).

target.mrk: Pro více informací běžte na[Země a podpora překladu](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/compliance/apptest-countries-and-translations).

trans-unit.source: How do I get [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)]?

seg-source.mrk: How do I get [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)]?

target.mrk: Jak získám [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)]?

trans-unit.source: You can sign up for a free trial to explore [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)].

seg-source.mrk: You can sign up for a free trial to explore [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)].

target.mrk: Můžete se zaregistrovat a vyzkoušet bezplatnou zkušební verzi.[!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)].

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [free_trial_md](includes/free_trial_md.md)] If you want more time to explore, [you can extend your trial period](#can-i-extend-my-30-day-new-company-trial-period).

seg-source.mrk: If you want more time to explore, [you can extend your trial period](#can-i-extend-my-30-day-new-company-trial-period).

target.mrk: Pokud budete chtít více času k prohlížení, [můžete prodloužit bezplatnou zkušební dobu](#can-i-extend-my-30-day-new-company-trial-period).

trans-unit.source: To help you get ready for doing business in [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], you can launch assisted setup guides, videos, or help topics for selected setup tasks.

seg-source.mrk: To help you get ready for doing business in [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], you can launch assisted setup guides, videos, or help topics for selected setup tasks.

target.mrk: Chcete-li se připravit na podnikání v [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], můžete pro vybrané nastavení spustit průvodce asistovaného nastavení, videa nebo nápovědu.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Getting Ready for Doing Business](ui-get-ready-business.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Getting Ready for Doing Business](ui-get-ready-business.md).

target.mrk: Pro více infomací běžte na [Příprava na podnikání](ui-get-ready-business.md).

trans-unit.source: When you are ready to buy [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], you can find a [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)] partner on the [I'm looking for a solution provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145) page.

seg-source.mrk: When you are ready to buy [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], you can find a [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)] partner on the [I'm looking for a solution provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145) page.

target.mrk: Pokus jste připraveni ke koupi [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], můžete vyhledat [!INCLUDE [prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)] partnera na [Hledám poskytovatele řešení](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145).

trans-unit.source: Where do I go if I have questions?

seg-source.mrk: Where do I go if I have questions?

target.mrk: Kam mám jít, pokud mám dotazy?

trans-unit.source: If you have questions about [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] that you can't find an answer for in this documentation, you can ask the Business Central community.

seg-source.mrk: If you have questions about [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] that you can't find an answer for in this documentation, you can ask the Business Central community.

target.mrk: Máte-li dotazy k [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], na které nemůžete v této dokumentaci najít odpověď, můžete se zeptat komunity Business Central.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dynamics 365 Business Central community](https://community.dynamics.com/business).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Dynamics 365 Business Central community](https://community.dynamics.com/business).

target.mrk: Více informací naleznete na [Komunita Dynamics 365 Business Cental](https://community.dynamics.com/business)

trans-unit.source: From the community home page, you can also find links to our blogs where you can also find tips and tricks.

seg-source.mrk: From the community home page, you can also find links to our blogs where you can also find tips and tricks.

target.mrk: Na domovské stránce komunity najdete také odkazy na naše blogy, kde najdete také tipy a triky.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dynamics 365 Business Central Blog](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/financials) and [Dynamics 365 Business Central Support Blog](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/dynamics365financialssupport).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Dynamics 365 Business Central Blog](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/financials) and [Dynamics 365 Business Central Support Blog](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/dynamics365financialssupport).

target.mrk: Další informace naleznete na [blogu Dynamics 365 Business Central](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/financials) a [Blogu podpory Dynamics 365 Business Central](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/dynamics365financialssupport)

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can contact your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] reselling partner.

seg-source.mrk: Finally, you can contact your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] reselling partner.

target.mrk: Nakonec se můžete obrátit na svého prodejce [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [How do I get technical support?](across-faq.md#how-do-i-get-technical-support-for-) section.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the [How do I get technical support?](across-faq.md#how-do-i-get-technical-support-for-) section.

target.mrk: Pro více informací běžte na sekci [Jak dostat technickou podporu](across-faq.md#how-do-i-get-technical-support-for-).

trans-unit.source: Why can't I find that capability in my [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

seg-source.mrk: Why can't I find that capability in my [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

target.mrk: Proč nemohu najít tuto vlastnost ve svém [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

trans-unit.source: Did you read about a new capability in the release notes or on our blog recently?

seg-source.mrk: Did you read about a new capability in the release notes or on our blog recently?

target.mrk: Četli jste nedávno v poznámkách k vydání nebo na našem blogu o nových možnostech?

trans-unit.source: In that case, your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] might not have been upgraded to the latest version yet.

seg-source.mrk: In that case, your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] might not have been upgraded to the latest version yet.

target.mrk: V případě, že Váš [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] možná zatím nebyl aktualizován na poslední verzi.

trans-unit.source: If the capability is published as an extension in AppSource, then there is a delay between the extension being announced and its availability in AppSource.

seg-source.mrk: If the capability is published as an extension in AppSource, then there is a delay between the extension being announced and its availability in AppSource.

target.mrk: Pokud je tato funkce publikována jako rozšíření v AppSource, pak existuje zpoždění mezi oznámeným rozšířením a jeho dostupností v AppSource.

trans-unit.source: Can I get training in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

seg-source.mrk: Can I get training in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

target.mrk: Mohu se zúčastnit školení [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can.

seg-source.mrk: Yes, you can.

target.mrk: Ano, můžete.

trans-unit.source: But currently, you have to ask your reselling partner.

seg-source.mrk: But currently, you have to ask your reselling partner.

target.mrk: Ale nejdříve kontaktujte vašeho partnera.

trans-unit.source: If you don't know who that is, find a Business Central partner on the [I'm looking for a solution provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145) page.

seg-source.mrk: If you don't know who that is, find a Business Central partner on the [I'm looking for a solution provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145) page.

target.mrk: Pokud nevíte, kdo to je, najděte partnera Business Central na stránce [Hledám poskytovatele řešení](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145).

trans-unit.source: If you have access to Microsoft CustomerSource, you can get access to the Imagine Academy site with eLearning material.

seg-source.mrk: If you have access to Microsoft CustomerSource, you can get access to the Imagine Academy site with eLearning material.

target.mrk: Pokud máte přístup k Microsoft CustomerSource, můžete získat přístup k webu Imagine Academy pomocí materiálu eLearning.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to get access, see the [Microsoft Dynamics 365 training](/dynamics365/get-started/training/index#dynamics-365-customers) page.

seg-source.mrk: For more information on how to get access, see the [Microsoft Dynamics 365 training](/dynamics365/get-started/training/index#dynamics-365-customers) page.

target.mrk: Další informace o tom, jak získat přístup, naleznete na stránce [Školení Microsoft Dynamics 365](/dynamics365/get-started/training/index#dynamics-365-customers).

trans-unit.source: How do I get technical support for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

seg-source.mrk: How do I get technical support for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

target.mrk: Jak získám technickou podporu pro [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is sold through partners, and you should contact your reselling partner to get help with technical problems.

seg-source.mrk: is sold through partners, and you should contact your reselling partner to get help with technical problems.

target.mrk: se prodává prostřednictvím partnerů a měli byste se obrátit na svého partnera, který vám pomůže s technickými problémy.

trans-unit.source: If your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner then cannot resolve the problem, they will raise a support ticket with Microsoft.

seg-source.mrk: If your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner then cannot resolve the problem, they will raise a support ticket with Microsoft.

target.mrk: Pokud váš [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner nemůže problém vyřešit, získá u společnosti Microsoft podporu.

trans-unit.source: If you have signed up for a trial and have not yet purchased [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you do not have a reselling partner, and you cannot contact the Microsoft support team.

seg-source.mrk: If you have signed up for a trial and have not yet purchased [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you do not have a reselling partner, and you cannot contact the Microsoft support team.

target.mrk: Pokud jste si zaregistrovali pro zkušební verzi [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], dosud jste si ji nezakoupili a nemáte partnera, nemůžete kontaktovat tým podpory společnosti Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: You can find a Business Central partner on the [I'm looking for a solution provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145) page.

seg-source.mrk: You can find a Business Central partner on the [I'm looking for a solution provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145) page.

target.mrk: Můžete najít Business Central partnera na stránce [Hledám poskytovatele řešení](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2038145).

trans-unit.source: Why does Help describe functionality that I cannot access?

seg-source.mrk: Why does Help describe functionality that I cannot access?

target.mrk: Proč nápověda popisuje funkcionality, na kterou nemám přístup?

trans-unit.source: If your Experience setting on the **Company Information** page is set to **Essential**, then UI elements for the Manufacturing and Service Management features are not visible to you because they require the **Premium** experience.

seg-source.mrk: If your Experience setting on the **Company Information** page is set to **Essential**, then UI elements for the Manufacturing and Service Management features are not visible to you because they require the **Premium** experience.

target.mrk: Pokud vaše nastavení Experience na stránce **Informace o společnosti** je nastaveno na **Essential**, potom prvky uživatelského prostředí pro funkce Výroby a Servisu nejsou viditelné, protože vyžadují **Premium** experience.

trans-unit.source: A text note is inserted in high-level help topics for these feature areas.

seg-source.mrk: A text note is inserted in high-level help topics for these feature areas.

target.mrk: Textová poznámka je vložena v hlavních nadpisech pro oblasti aplikace.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Changing Which Features are Displayed](ui-experiences.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Changing Which Features are Displayed](ui-experiences.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace se podívejte na [Změna zobrazování funkcí](ui-experiences.md).

trans-unit.source: What email address can I use with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

seg-source.mrk: What email address can I use with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

target.mrk: Jakou e-mailovou adresu mohu použít v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] requires that you use a work, or school, email address to sign up.

seg-source.mrk: requires that you use a work, or school, email address to sign up.

target.mrk: vyžaduje, abyste k registraci použili e-mailovou adresu práce nebo školy.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] does not support email addresses provided by consumer email services or telecommunication providers.

seg-source.mrk: does not support email addresses provided by consumer email services or telecommunication providers.

target.mrk: nepodporuje e-mailové adresy poskytované spotřebitelskými e-mailovými službami nebo poskytovateli telekomunikačních služeb.

trans-unit.source: This includes outlook.com, hotmail.com, gmail.com, and others.

seg-source.mrk: This includes outlook.com, hotmail.com, gmail.com, and others.

target.mrk: To zahrnuje outlook.com, hotmail.com, gmail.com a další.

trans-unit.source: If you try to sign up with a personal email address, you will get a message indicating to use a work or school email address.

seg-source.mrk: If you try to sign up with a personal email address, you will get a message indicating to use a work or school email address.

target.mrk: Pokud se pokusíte zaregistrovat pomocí své osobní e-mailové adresy, zobrazí se zpráva, že bude třeba použít pracovní nebo školní e-mailovou adresu.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Troubleshooting Self-Service Sign-Up](ui-troubleshoot-self-signup.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Troubleshooting Self-Service Sign-Up](ui-troubleshoot-self-signup.md).

target.mrk: Další informace naleznete na stránce [Odstraňování problémů se samoobslužným přihlášením](ui-troubleshoot-self-signup.md).

trans-unit.source: If you want to deploy [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] on-premises, then you can use other authentication methods.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to deploy [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] on-premises, then you can use other authentication methods.

target.mrk: Pokud chcete nasadit [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] on-premises, můžete použít jiné metody ověřování.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Deployment of Dynamics 365 Business Central](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/deployment/deployment).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Deployment of Dynamics 365 Business Central](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/deployment/deployment).

target.mrk: Více informací naleznete na [Nasazení Dynamics 365 Business Cental](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/deployment/deployment)

trans-unit.source: Do I have to buy Office 365?

seg-source.mrk: Do I have to buy Office 365?

target.mrk: Musím si koupit Office 365?

trans-unit.source: No.

seg-source.mrk: No.

target.mrk: Ne.

trans-unit.source: But if you want to experience [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as fully integrated with Office 365, you can sign up for a 1-month free trial of Office 365 [here](https://products.office.com/try).

seg-source.mrk: But if you want to experience [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as fully integrated with Office 365, you can sign up for a 1-month free trial of Office 365 [here](https://products.office.com/try).

target.mrk: Pokud se chcete mít zkušenost s [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako plně integrovaný s Office 365, můžete se zaregistrovat na bezplatnou zkušební verzi Office 365 na 1 měsíc [zde](https://products.office.com/try).

trans-unit.source: If the account you sign up with is a non-Office 365 work account (such as joe@mysolution.com), and you have an Office 365 subscription, then you can associate your domain (mysolution.com) with the Office 365 subscription.

seg-source.mrk: If the account you sign up with is a non-Office 365 work account (such as joe@mysolution.com), and you have an Office 365 subscription, then you can associate your domain (mysolution.com) with the Office 365 subscription.

target.mrk: Pokud účet, se kterým se zaregistrujete není účet Office 365 (například joe@mysolution.com) a máte předplatné sady Office 365, můžete svou doménu (mysolution.com) spojit s předplatným sady Office 365.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Get help with Office 365 domains](/office365/admin/get-help-with-domains/get-help-with-domains?view=o365-worldwide).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Get help with Office 365 domains](/office365/admin/get-help-with-domains/get-help-with-domains?view=o365-worldwide).

target.mrk: Pro více informací běžte na [Získejte pomoc s doménami Office 365](/office365/admin/get-help-with-domains/get-help-with-domains?view=o365-worldwide)

trans-unit.source: If you do not have an Office 365 subscription, and you do not want to buy one, then, when you sign up, we provision a new Azure Active Directory tenant for you so that you have access to the Azure portal where you have access to advanced administration tools.

seg-source.mrk: If you do not have an Office 365 subscription, and you do not want to buy one, then, when you sign up, we provision a new Azure Active Directory tenant for you so that you have access to the Azure portal where you have access to advanced administration tools.

target.mrk: Pokud nemáte předplatné sady Office 365 a nechcete si ho kupovat, poskytneme vám při registraci nový tenant služby Azure Active Directory, abyste měli přístup k portálu Azure, kde máte přístup pokročilé nástroje pro správu.

trans-unit.source: What is the integration with Office 365 about?

seg-source.mrk: What is the integration with Office 365 about?

target.mrk: O čem je integrace s Office 365?

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is fully integrated with Office 365 so that you can navigate freely between Office 365 apps and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] using the app launcher.

seg-source.mrk: is fully integrated with Office 365 so that you can navigate freely between Office 365 apps and [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] using the app launcher.

target.mrk: je plně integrován s Office 365, takže můžete volně procházet mezi aplikacemi Office 365 a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] pomocí launcheru aplikací.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you can open data in Excel, print reports using Word, and you can work with your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data in Outlook, for example.

seg-source.mrk: In [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you can open data in Excel, print reports using Word, and you can work with your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data in Outlook, for example.

target.mrk: V [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] můžete otevírat data v Excelu, tisknout sestavy pomocí aplikace Word a pracovat s vašimi [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] daty například v aplikaci Outlook.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as your Business Inbox in Outlook](admin-outlook.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as your Business Inbox in Outlook](admin-outlook.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací bežte na [Použití[!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako vaše obchodní schránka v Outlook](admin-outlook.md).

trans-unit.source: Can I extend my 30-day “New Company” trial period?

seg-source.mrk: Can I extend my 30-day “New Company” trial period?

target.mrk: Mohu prodloužit 30 denní zkušební období pro „Novou společnost“?

trans-unit.source: Yes.

seg-source.mrk: Yes.

target.mrk: Ano.

trans-unit.source: When the expiration date for your trial period is approaching we will display a notification to alert you when you sign in.

seg-source.mrk: When the expiration date for your trial period is approaching we will display a notification to alert you when you sign in.

target.mrk: Když se blíží datum vypršení zkušební doby, zobrazí se vám upozornění, jakmile se budete přihlašovat.

trans-unit.source: The notification contains a link to the **Extend Trial Period** guide that you can use to extend your trial period.

seg-source.mrk: The notification contains a link to the **Extend Trial Period** guide that you can use to extend your trial period.

target.mrk: Oznámení obsahuje odkaz na průvodce **Prodloužit zkušební období**, který můžete použít k prodloužení zkušební doby.

trans-unit.source: The extra 30 days start the moment you choose **Extend Trial** in the guide.

seg-source.mrk: The extra 30 days start the moment you choose **Extend Trial** in the guide.

target.mrk: Dalších 30 dní začíná okamžikem, kdy v průvodci zvolíte **Prodloužit zkušební verzi**.

trans-unit.source: You can extend the trial period one time yourself.

seg-source.mrk: You can extend the trial period one time yourself.

target.mrk: Zkušební období můžete jednou prodloužit sami.

trans-unit.source: After that, a Microsoft partner can extend it for another 30 days.

seg-source.mrk: After that, a Microsoft partner can extend it for another 30 days.

target.mrk: Poté jej může partner společnosti Microsoft prodloužit o dalších 30 dní.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extend Your Trial Version](admin-extend-trial.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Extend Your Trial Version](admin-extend-trial.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací běžte na [Prodloužení Vaší zkušební verze](admin-extend-trial.md).

trans-unit.source: To contact a Microsoft partner in your country or region now, see the list of phone numbers in [CustomerSource](https://mbs.microsoft.com/customersource/northamerica/CRM/support/support-news/Support_Telephone#linkc).

seg-source.mrk: To contact a Microsoft partner in your country or region now, see the list of phone numbers in [CustomerSource](https://mbs.microsoft.com/customersource/northamerica/CRM/support/support-news/Support_Telephone#linkc).

target.mrk: Chcete-li kontaktovat partnera společnosti Microsoft ve vaší zemi nebo oblasti, přečtěte si seznam telefonních čísel v [CustomerSource](https://mbs.microsoft.com/customersource/northamerica/CRM/support/support-news/Support_Telephone#linkc).

trans-unit.source: It may take up to two business days to complete the trial extension process.

seg-source.mrk: It may take up to two business days to complete the trial extension process.

target.mrk: Dokončení procesu rozšíření zkušebního období může trvat až dva pracovní dny.

trans-unit.source: Our administrator has moved me to another plan to give me another role, but I still see the same Role Center in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

seg-source.mrk: Our administrator has moved me to another plan to give me another role, but I still see the same Role Center in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

target.mrk: Náš správce mě přesunul do jiného plánu, aby mi dal jinou roli, ale stále vidím stejné Centrum rolí v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]?

trans-unit.source: This is a bit complicated, but it looks like your administrator didn't change your Role Center and assign user groups that match the new license.

seg-source.mrk: This is a bit complicated, but it looks like your administrator didn't change your Role Center and assign user groups that match the new license.

target.mrk: Je to trochu komplikované, ale zdá se, že váš správce nezměnil vaše Centrum rolí a nepřidělil skupiny uživatelů, které odpovídají nové licenci.

trans-unit.source: Essentially, your access to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is determined by the type of plan (license) that you have - this sets permissions and your default Role Center page.

seg-source.mrk: Essentially, your access to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is determined by the type of plan (license) that you have - this sets permissions and your default Role Center page.

target.mrk: Váš přístup do [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] je v zásadě určen typem plánu (licence), který máte - to nastavuje oprávnění a výchozí stránku Centra rolí.

trans-unit.source: You can change your Role Center manually in My Settings, but if you are moved to another plan, such as moving you from the Business plan to the Team Members plan, you might see the old Home because your permissions were not changed.

seg-source.mrk: You can change your Role Center manually in My Settings, but if you are moved to another plan, such as moving you from the Business plan to the Team Members plan, you might see the old Home because your permissions were not changed.

target.mrk: Centrum rolí můžete změnit ručně v části Moje nastavení, ale pokud jste přesunuti do jiného plánu, například přesunem z Business plan do Team Members plan, můžete vidět starou Homepage, protože vaše oprávnění se nezměnila.

trans-unit.source: Can I cancel my subscription?

seg-source.mrk: Can I cancel my subscription?

target.mrk: Můžu zrušit své předplatné?

trans-unit.source: Yes, but depending on how you signed up to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], your data can be deleted or preserved.

seg-source.mrk: Yes, but depending on how you signed up to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], your data can be deleted or preserved.

target.mrk: Ano, ale v závislosti na tom, jak jste se zaregistrovali v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], mohou být vaše data smazána nebo zachována.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Canceling [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](admin-cancel.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Canceling [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](admin-cancel.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace, viz [Zrušení [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](admin-cancel.md).

trans-unit.source: Can I use multi-factor authentication?

seg-source.mrk: Can I use multi-factor authentication?

target.mrk: Mohu použít vícefaktorové ověřování?

trans-unit.source: Sure.

seg-source.mrk: Sure.

target.mrk: Určitě.

trans-unit.source: If you do, you might need an app password in order to send email messages.

seg-source.mrk: If you do, you might need an app password in order to send email messages.

target.mrk: Pokud tak učiníte, možná budete potřebovat heslo aplikace pro odesílání e-mailových zpráv.

trans-unit.source: App passwords give an app or a device access to your email account.

seg-source.mrk: App passwords give an app or a device access to your email account.

target.mrk: Hesla aplikace dává aplikaci nebo zařízení přístup k vašemu e-mailovému účtu.

trans-unit.source: The steps for getting an app password vary, depending on your email provider.

seg-source.mrk: The steps for getting an app password vary, depending on your email provider.

target.mrk: Postup získání hesla aplikace se liší v závislosti na poskytovateli e-mailu.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the help from your provider.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the help from your provider.

target.mrk: Další informace naleznete v nápovědě vašeho poskytovatele.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you're using Outlook, see [Create an app password for Office 365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2082543).

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you're using Outlook, see [Create an app password for Office 365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2082543).

target.mrk: Pokud například používáte aplikaci Outlook, běžte na [Vytvoření hesla aplikace pro Office 365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2082543).

target.mrk: Viz také
